title: Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter Among Social Media Sites Moving Into News
teaser: Millennials' top source for political news is Facebook, according to a recent study. Now, other social networks are trying to get on board.
contentencoded:
Facebook is millennials’ No. 1 source for political news, according to a recent study by Pew Research Center. Now, other social media outlets are trying to get on board.

Here & Now‘s Robin Young speaks with media analyst John Carroll about social networks’ stampede to become news outlets and get journalists on staff.

Guest

  • John Carroll, Here & Now media analyst and professor of mass communications at Boston University. His blog is “Campaign Outsider” and he tweets @johncarroll_bu.
